free_text.Content: The themes addressed in this working group are symplectic, Poisson, and Dirac geometry, Geometric mechanics, integrable systems, Hamiltonian dynamics, geometric integration, stochastic mechanical systems (both holonomic and non-holonomic), field theory, imaging, control,molecular dynamics, fluid dynamics
free_text.Keywords: Symplectic geometry, differential geometry, mechanics, fluid dynamics, Hamiltoni dynamics
free_text.Required prior knowledge: Differential geometry, analysis, symplectic geometry, mechanics

free_text.Contenu: The themes addressed in this working group are symplectic, Poisson, and Dirac geometry, Geometric mechanics, integrable systems, Hamiltonian dynamics, geometric integration, stochastic mechanical systems (both holonomic and non-holonomic), field theory, imaging, control,molecular dynamics, fluid dynamics
